title: Review: Basso’s new Palta II gravel bike is more capable & well-rounded!
content:
Just over a week ago, Basso debuted their updated, made-in-Italy carbon Palta II gravel bike. While some gravel bikes try to be everything to everyone, the original Palta wasn’t afraid to embrace its on-road racing heritage, sticking to what Basso knew best as a gravel road bike.
